content:
{"name": "Our Lady of Fatima Church - Marguerite's Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "**Before you come
* If you already have a Plentiful ID card, please make sure you bring it with you to be scanned  on Pantry Day.
* If you applied last month at the Pantry, you will need to pick up your card on Pantry Day and have it scanned
* If this is your first time coming to Marguerite’s Pantry:
	* You will need to complete a short application. You will need to give an accurate telephone number to apply
	* OR you may want to download the Plentiful app on your phone and fill out your information beforehand. Please follow the link below to get to the Plentiful website.
https://plentifulapp.com/

**On pantry day** 
* Arrive early and be prepared to wait as there are many families in need. The line starts around 7 am. PLEASE DO NOT LINE UP THE NIGHT BEFORE THE PANTRY!
* Be considerate of others on the line especially the elderly and pregnant women
* Keep all small children close by you
", "email": "", "url": "https://margueritespantry.org/upcoming-dates/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "25-02 80th St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11370", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7622976, "longitude": -73.88888519999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 899-2801", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}]}
